title: Move Zeroes
description:
Given an integer array `nums`, move all `0`'s to the end of it while maintaining the relative order of the non-zero elements.

**Note** that you must do this in-place without making a copy of the array. Your function should return the modified array.

examples.explanation: After moving zeroes to the end, the non-zero elements 1, 3, 12 maintain their original order.
The array contains only a zero, so it remains unchanged.
